name: Exwordcist
description:
Story

You are an Exwordcist. You Exorcise demons by chanting words. Demons are getting out via a portal. Start chanting words like you never chanted before!

Gameplay

Type the words on screen to kill monsters. Successful word typing will increase your combo meter that will yield more score for you.

This is an infinite typing game which gets harder every second . Aim for the highest score!

Web: 

Playing this game without Leaderboard is sort of pointless. And I'm unable to provide SSL certificate for API's that handle that.
